ygData.subject: Re: An odd Cleric Question
ygData.msgSnippet: I play mostly on Tarrew Marr but also some on Rathe and I ve had a mostly good experience on both... not to say there is no kill stealing or that every person
ygData.messageBody:
I play mostly on Tarrew Marr but also some on Rathe and I've had a mostly good experience on both... not to say there is no kill stealing or that every person is pleasant... there will always be a few who enjoy making the game less fun for the masses... but in general both seem like good servers to play on.

-Eachann Bronzeleaf
-Cleric of Tunare, Tarrew Marr

----- Original Message -----
From: Chris Wheeler <wheelech@...>
To: <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, November 09, 1999 1:51 PM
Subject: RE: [EQ-Clerics] An odd Cleric Question


> From: Chris Wheeler <wheelech@...>
>
> I'm partial to the Rathe myself. I've played on Mithaniel Marr as well.
> However, I'd say that the Rathe is pretty decent. I've not noticed any
> KS'ing. It is one of the more crowded servers, but really, what is the
> difference between 1500 and 1700 players? Not much. I also find, in terms
> of start towns, that Rivervale is probably the best one. Lots of helpful
> people, and because it is a crossroads town, you get many players coming
> thru there.
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Thormael LGT [mailto:thormael@...]
> Sent: 1999/11/09 1:50 PM
> To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] An odd Cleric Question
>
>
> From: "Thormael LGT" <thormael@...>
>
> I left Fennin Ro for Tunare some months ago now and I like it TREMENDOUSLY
> better. :)
> Less crowded, less kill stealing, nicer people, IMHO, of course.
>
> Thormael
>
>
> >From: EvertorN <evertorn@...>
> >Reply-To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
> >To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
> >Subject: [EQ-Clerics] An odd Cleric Question
> >Date: Tue, 09 Nov 1999 06:15:29 -0700
> >
> >Hi all. I decided this would be a good place to put this, since everyone
> >has
> >good input on our class, while others refuse to help one another, I dunno.
> >Basically I currently play on veeshan server, and for months have been fed
> >up
> >with it. Now I've heard other ppl say (and could be rumors) that there is
> >less
> >ks'ing on other servers, as well as not a dominate god guild like foh on
> >the
> >server. (to Those of you possibly in FOH on this list, no offense, the
> >group of
> >friends I play with (UWS) as well as I have had bad run ins with your
> >guild.
> >Basically FoH and UWS has gone there...let's not do it again in here)
> >
> >So basically my question to you is the server you play on how do you like
> >it?
> >I'm seriously considereing abandoning all my characters on Veeshan to play
> >on a
> >better server. This game is all about the playability in the environment,
> >which
> >veeshan seriously limits those not powerhungry play the game.
> >
> >Evertorn Soul
> >Level 20 Erudite Cleric on Veeshan
>
>
